articles.title: Starmer sees viable chance of Ukraine ceasefire as Zelensky visits London - BBC
articles.description: The UK prime minister was addressing European leaders ahead of Friday's summit between Donald Trump and Vladimir Putin.
articles.content:
Kate Whannel
Prime Minister Sir Keir Starmer has welcomed Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky to Downing Street for private discussions.
The pair are meeting ahead of a vital summit in Alaska be… [+3849 chars]

articles.title: Photos of the wildfires in Europe displacing thousands as residents join efforts to fight the flames - AP News
articles.description: Wildfires are burning in parts of Europe, displacing thousands, as water-dropping planes and helicopters swoop overhead and residents join the effort, beating back flames with cut branches or dousing them with buckets of water.
articles.content: This photo, provided by the Securite Civile on Thursday Aug. 7, 2025, shows a fire man using a hose next to the wildfire near Saint-Laurent-de-la-Cabrerisse, southern France, Wednesday, Aug. 6, 2025.… [+24 chars]
